(kocsma alsó szerelőlap)
(cmd line: -i kocsma_doboz_alja_1mm.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i kocsma_doboz_alja_1mm.txt -t -p)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d1 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f700

z1 = 3
zh1 = 3.5
(vágás fogásmélység egy menetben)
#c1 = 0.375
c1 = 0.075
c2 = 0.025
ujg = 0.2

(pi3b furatok)
b corners 81,7 size58,49 z$zh1 c$c1 d2.75

(pi3b keret)
# 82.6+58+3.5-85 , 6-3.5
b inline 77.5,3.5 size65,56 z$z1 c$c2 g1,1,1.5 jg0.5 vy7.5 vx7 nl0,1,1,1
b inline 52.5,3.5 size20,56 z$z1 c$c2 g1,1,1.5 jg0.5 vy0 vx0 nl1,1,0,1
(kártya)
b inline 142.5,22.5 size16,17 z$z1 c$c2 g1,1,1.5 jg0.5 r4 rj0 nl0,1,1,1
(hálókábel)
b inline 30,39 size22.5,20.5 z$z1 c$c2 g1,1,1.5 jg0.5 r4 rj0 nl1,1,0,1

# pi ja sarok
b outline 76.5,4 size8,6.5 z$z1 c$c2 ng r3 rj2  nl1,1,1,0
l 85,7 85,0.5 z1.5 c$c2

# ba sarok
b outline 135.5,3.5 size6.8,6.5 z$z1 c$c2 ng r3 rj0 nl1,1,0,0
l 135,4 135,0.5 z1.5 c$c2

#jf
b outline 76,52.5 size8.5,6.5 z$z1 c$c2 ng r3 rj2 nl1,0,1,1
l 85,59.5 85,57 z1.5 c$c2

#bf
b outline 135.5,53 size6.8,6.5 z$z1 c$c2 r3 rj0 nl1,0,0,1

(táp 12V - furat táv 55mm)
h 130,87 size161,111 z$zh1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1
h 75,87 size161,111 z$zh1 c$c1 d3 jg0.1

(alátámasztás)
#ay1 = 63
#l 0,$ay1 5,$ay1 z$z1 c$c2
#l 160,$ay1 165,$ay1

(rögzítő furatok)
#doboz sarkok
b corners 16.5,12.5 size132,91 z$zh1 c$c1 d3 jg0.5
#jobb oldali
h 30,12.5 z$zh1 c$c1 jg0.1 d3
h 30,103.5 z$zh1 c$c1 jg0.1 d3


b outline 0,0 size165,115 z$z1 c$c2 g3,2,1.5 jg0.75 vy11 vx20
#g1,1,2.5
b outline 0,0 size8,17 z$z1 c$c2 ng jg0.75 r4 rj2 nl0,1,1,0
b outline 0,98 size8,17 z$z1 c$c2 ng jg0.75 r4 rj2 nl0,0,1,1

b outline 157,0 size8,17 z$z1 c$c2 ng jg0.75 r4 rj2 nl1,1,0,0
b outline 157,98 size8,17 z$z1 c$c2 ng jg0.75 r4 rj2 nl1,0,0,1


(körvonal)
#oldalt
h 0.75,55.3 z$zh1 c$c1 d3
h 0.75,59.2 z$zh1 c$c1 d3

h 38.15,0.75 z$zh1 c$c1 d3
h 41.7,0.75 z$zh1 c$c1 d3
